description:
Katie is a marine currently in the U.N. Forces. Due to her previous experience in close combat, she is training to be assigned to the VF-0 team. Her physical strength and can-do spirit complements http://anidb.net/ch14110 [Kudou Shin]`s own attributes as the two train together.
Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Katie
name: Katie
